xdi2.core.impl

Class AbstractContextNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.impl.AbstractNode
      • xdi2.core.impl.AbstractContextNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ContextNode>, ContextNode, Node
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyContextNode, JSONContextNode, KeyValueContextNode, MemoryContextNode, WrappedContextNode

    public abstract class AbstractContextNode
extends AbstractNode
implements ContextNode
    See Also:
